con:transfers.con:name: objectName
con:transfers.con:sourceStep: Groovy Script to Create Object Name

con:request.name: Create Folder For DE
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <h:fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com" xmlns:h="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accessToken}</h:fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
<ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:DataFolder" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:ParentFolder> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ID>${getCategoryCollection#Response#$.items[0].id}</ns1:ID> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> </ns1:ParentFolder> <ns1:Name>DEFolder ç†Šæœ¬å¤§å­¦ ã‚¤ã‚¿ãƒªã‚¢ ${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:Name> <ns1:Description>DE folder ç†Šæœ¬å¤§å­¦ ã‚¤ã‚¿ãƒªã‚¢ ${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:Description> <ns1:ContentType>dataextension</ns1:ContentType> <ns1:IsActive>true</ns1:IsActive> <ns1:IsEditable>true</ns1:IsEditable> <ns1:AllowChildren>true</ns1:AllowChildren> </ns1:Objects> </CreateRequest>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Sendable Data Extension
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <h:fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com" xmlns:h="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accessToken}</h:fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
<ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:DataExtension" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:Name>DE ${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:Name> <ns1:IsSendable>true</ns1:IsSendable> <ns1:SendableDataExtensionField> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:Name>EmailAddress</ns1:Name> </ns1:SendableDataExtensionField> <ns1:SendableSubscriberField> <ns1:Name>Subscriber Key</ns1:Name> <ns1:Value>EmailAddress</ns1:Value> </ns1:SendableSubscriberField> <ns1:Fields> <ns1:Field> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:Name>EmailAddress</ns1:Name> <ns1:IsRequired>true</ns1:IsRequired> <ns1:FieldType>EmailAddress</ns1:FieldType> </ns1:Field> <ns1:Field> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:Name>Gender</ns1:Name> <ns1:IsRequired>false</ns1:IsRequired> <ns1:FieldType>Text</ns1:FieldType> </ns1:Field> <ns1:Field> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:Name>Region</ns1:Name> <ns1:IsRequired>false</ns1:IsRequired> <ns1:FieldType>Text</ns1:FieldType> </ns1:Field> <ns1:Field> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:Name>Full Name</ns1:Name> <ns1:IsRequired>false</ns1:IsRequired> <ns1:FieldType>Text</ns1:FieldType> </ns1:Field> </ns1:Fields> </ns1:Objects> </CreateRequest>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Filter Definition on Gender
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <h:fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com" xmlns:h="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accessToken}</h:fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
<ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:FilterDefinition" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:Name>FD ${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:Name> <ns1:Description>Created via SOAP API</ns1:Description> <ns1:DataSource xsi:type="ns1:DataExtension"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${Create Sendable Data Extension#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:CustomerKey> </ns1:DataSource> <ns1:DataFilter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart"> <ns1:Property>Gender</ns1:Property> <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator> <ns1:Value>Female</ns1:Value> </ns1:DataFilter> </ns1:Objects> </CreateRequest>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Retrieve FilterDef by ObjectID
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <h:fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com" xmlns:h="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accessToken}</h:fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <RetrieveRequest> <ObjectType>FilterDefinition</ObjectType> <Properties>ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>Client.ID</Properties> <Properties>Name</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ListName</Properties> <Properties>CustomerKey</Properties> <Properties>CreatedDate</Properties> <Properties>ModifiedDate</Properties> <Properties>Description</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ID</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.Name</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.CustomerKey</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.CreatedDate</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ModifiedDate</Properties> <Properties>DataFilter</Properties> <ns1:Filter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:Property>ObjectID</ns1:Property> <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator> <ns1:Value>${Create Filter Definition on Gender#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateResponse[1]/ns1:Results[1]/ns1:Object[1]/ns1:ObjectID[1]}</ns1:Value> </ns1:Filter> </RetrieveRequest> </RetrieveRequestMsg>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Retrieve FilterDef by DE CustomerKey
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <h:fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com" xmlns:h="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accessToken}</h:fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <RetrieveRequest> <ObjectType>FilterDefinition</ObjectType> <Properties>ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>Client.ID</Properties> <Properties>Name</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ListName</Properties> <Properties>CustomerKey</Properties> <Properties>CreatedDate</Properties> <Properties>ModifiedDate</Properties> <Properties>Description</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ID</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.Name</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.CustomerKey</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.CreatedDate</Properties> <Properties>DataSource.ModifiedDate</Properties> <Properties>DataFilter</Properties> <ns1:Filter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:Property>DataSource.CustomerKey</ns1:Property> <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator> <ns1:Value>${Create Sendable Data Extension#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:Value> </ns1:Filter> </RetrieveRequest> </RetrieveRequestMsg>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Update Filter Criteria By CustomerKey
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <h:fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com" xmlns:h="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accessToken}</h:fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <UpdateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
<ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:FilterDefinition" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${Create Filter Definition on Gender#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:DataSource xsi:type="ns1:DataExtension"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${Create Sendable Data Extension#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:CustomerKey> </ns1:DataSource> <ns1:DataFilter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart"> <ns1:Property>Gender</ns1:Property> <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator> <ns1:Value>Prefer not to say</ns1:Value> </ns1:DataFilter> </ns1:Objects> </UpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:assertion.name: Match Content of Updated Filter Value
